metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22960 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The parse function in llhttp < 2.1.4 and < 6.0.6. ignores chunk extensions when parsing the body of chunked requests. This leads to HTTP Request Smuggling (HRS) under certain conditions.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-22960` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnode72 - 12.22.9~dfsg-1ubuntu3
nodejs - 12.22.9~dfsg-1ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nodejs package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '12.22.9~dfsg-1ubuntu3').
